member.summary: Represents the base attribute for members capable of handling files.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.Model2View.Annotations.FileCapableAttributeBase.Accept
member.summary: Gets or sets a comma-separated list of file name extensions that limits the types of files a user can pick. If the value is null or empty (or only whitespace) then any file can be picked.

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.Model2View.Annotations.FileCapableAttributeBase.AcceptType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of file that can be picked up.

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.Model2View.Annotations.FileCapableAttributeBase.Multiple
member.summary: Indicates whether multiple file selection is allowed.

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.Model2View.Annotations.FileCapableAttributeBase.DropTargetId
member.summary: Gets or sets the identifier of an element that supports drag and drop.

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.Model2View.Annotations.FileCapableAttributeBase.DropEffect
member.summary: Gets or sets the icon that identifies a drag and drop operation. The default is 'copy'.

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.Model2View.Annotations.FileCapableAttributeBase.Method
member.summary: Gets or sets the method of the FileReader API (in JavaScript) to use.

member.name: T:Carfamsoft.Model2View.Annotations.FileReaderMethod
member.summary: Provides enumerated method names corresponding to JavaScript's FileReader API.

member.name: F:Carfamsoft.Model2View.Annotations.FileReaderMethod.None
member.summary: Nothing will be done.

member.name: F:Carfamsoft.Model2View.Annotations.FileReaderMethod.ReadAsArrayBuffer
member.summary: In JavaScript: Starts reading the contents of the specified Blob, once finished, the result attribute contains an ArrayBuffer representing the file's data.

member.name: F:Carfamsoft.Model2View.Annotations.FileReaderMethod.ReadAsBinaryString
member.summary: In JavaScript: Starts reading the contents of the specified Blob, once finished, the result attribute contains the raw binary data from the file as a string.

member.name: F:Carfamsoft.Model2View.Annotations.FileReaderMethod.ReadAsDataURL
member.summary: In JavaScript: Starts reading the contents of the specified Blob, once finished, the result attribute contains a data: URL representing the file's data.

member.name: F:Carfamsoft.Model2View.Annotations.FileReaderMethod.ReadAsText
member.summary: In JavaScript: Starts reading the contents of the specified Blob, once finished, the result attribute contains the contents of the file as a text string. An optional encoding name can be specified.

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.Model2View.Annotations.FormDisplayAttribute.UIHint
member.summary: Gets or sets a suggestion for the HTML element to generate. Supported elements are all standard HTML data collection elements such as input, select, textarea, etc. Other elements are not supported.

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.Model2View.Annotations.FormDisplayAttribute.Tag
member.summary: Gets or sets the tag or element name of the control to display. This is an alias for .

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.Model2View.Annotations.FormDisplayAttribute.UITypeHint
member.summary: Gets or sets a suggestion for the input type to generate. Supported types are all standard HTML input types (e. g. text, checkbox, number, date, file...). All type names must be in lower-case characters.

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.Model2View.Annotations.FormDisplayAttribute.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the control to display. This is an alias for .

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.Model2View.Annotations.FormDisplayAttribute.Icon
member.summary: Gets or sets an icon associated with the generated input.

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.Model2View.Annotations.FormDisplayAttribute.Format
member.summary: Gets or sets the data format. If you want to format a or , you must specify a valid value for and set to 'text'.

member.summary: The case-insensitive name of a culture to use for conversions and formatting.

member.name: T:Carfamsoft.Model2View.Annotations.ImagePreviewAttribute
member.summary: Represents a custom attribute that is used to generate inputs of type file, provides settings for image file reading and automatic preview generation using JavaScript's FileReader API.

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.Model2View.Annotations.ImagePreviewAttribute.TargetElementIdSuffix
member.summary: Gets or sets the default suffix for .

member.name: M:Carfamsoft.Model2View.Annotations.ImagePreviewAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by setting the property value to 'image' and the property value to .

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.Model2View.Annotations.ImagePreviewAttribute.TargetElementId
member.summary: Gets or sets the identifier of an HTML element (typically a tag) that will display the image. If this property's value is set, it can greatly improve performance of file reading operation as it avoids calling back .NET managed code from JavaScript with a huge amount of base64-encoded URL. By convention, if this property's value is null, the name of the property that it decorates is used with the value (e.g. the property 'Photo' will have a target element id of 'PhotoPreview'). If the value is empty, then the target element id should not be used. If specified, this property takes precedence over .

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.Model2View.Annotations.ImagePreviewAttribute.TargetElementAttributeName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the target element's attribute name that will receive the base64-encoded data URL. The default value is 'src'.

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.Model2View.Annotations.ImagePreviewAttribute.AutoGenerate
member.summary: Indicates whether a preview should be automatically generated for every selected image. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.Model2View.Annotations.ImagePreviewAttribute.GenerateFileInfo
member.summary: Indicates whether to include file metadata (name, size, etc.).

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.Model2View.Annotations.ImagePreviewAttribute.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets the preferred width of the thumbnail to be generated.

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.Model2View.Annotations.ImagePreviewAttribute.Height
member.summary: Gets or sets the preferred height of the thumbnail to be generated.
